segments.text: Excuse me , do you have the latest issue of Newsworld ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this week's issue just came in . Here it is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me check ... yes , we got the October issue a few days ago . It's on that shelf over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I'll take these two magazines and a copy of Today's Post .
segments.speaker: S1
